reviews.review_msg: It's not a question of him being hard or easy, it's the fact that he's an ideologue.  If you don't understand statistics like he does  you are not merely wrong, but summarily dismissed as illogical. This all comes from his overarching pseudo-Wittgensteinian philosophy of science. Keep him company during office hours and toe the line.
Great, highly intelligent prof. Unlike other profs, he is a scholar, not a business man. All told, great class.
Sticks to his guns; hammers home the basics but expects you to pick up the details; says exactly what he means; humble; I suspect this rating almost directly relfects the raters mark.
